concept.title: GCEQUAL Command
concept.shortdesc: Creates an equal geometric constraint on 2D entities.

conbody.p: Create an equal constraint to ensure circular entities maintain equal radii or linear entities maintain equal lengths.

section.title: Methods to create an equal constraint
section.p:
There are two methods to begin creating an equal constraint:
Select first entity
Multiple

dlentry.dd: Begin creating an equal constraint by selecting an arc, circle, line, or polyline segment then:
Select a similar entity to make equal to the first. The first entity maintains its radius or length while the radius or length of the second entity updates to match the first entity.
Begin creating more than one equal constraint by specifying the Multiple option then:
Select an arc, circle, line, or polyline segment.

dlentry.dt: Select entity to make equal to the first
dlentry.dd: Select a similar entity to make equal to the first. Continue selecting similar entities until you press Enter to end the command. The first entity maintains its radius or length while the radius or length of all subsequent entities update to match the first entity.
